content: काशः, --शं [काश्-अच्] {@--1@} A kind of grass used for mats, roofs, &c. --शं A flower of that grass; <ls>Ku. 7. 11</ls>; <ls>R. 4. 17</ls>; <ls>Rs. 3. 1</ls>, <ls n="Rs. 3.">2</ls>, <ls n="Rs. 3.">28.</ls> --शः {1} = कास <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--2@} Appearance. {@--3@} Splendour.
